name: Missile Dash
description:
TOP DOWN ARCADE SHOOTER

Missile dash is a fast paced top down arcade shooter in which you dodge missiles, dodge bullets and defeat your enemies by using your top gun skills.

EARLY ALPHA

This game is in a very early stage and only offers a very limited set of the features intended. This means that you can influence the direction the game is taking. Join the discussion on our Discord Server.

The goal is to develop:

  • A single screen endless experience (most completed feature)
  • Missions where you have a number of set objectives to complete with scrolling camera
  • 2-4 player battle mode
  • Different unlockable planes
  • Addons that you can fit on your plane
  • Multiplayer <BIG MAYBE>
HOW TO PLAY

Avoid all missiles and bullets as long as possible. In mission mode do the same but also take out your enemies.

CONTROLS

Use WASD or arrow keys to steer the plane. 

Dash by pressing up or shift buttons. You can only dash for a short while and then it needs to recharge to reach full capacity again. 

Fire missiles with space (only works in missions)

Gamepad is supported.
